rules_text:
You may pay {1}{G} rather than pay this spell’s mana cost. If you do, sacrifice it when it enters the battlefield.
When Greensea Amity enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Kelp creature token with “{T}: Add {G}.”
Untap all permanents you control during each other player’s untap step.
notes:
GW:
 - Odd MVs
 - +1/+1 counters
RG:
 - two of each land type
 - wayfarer 5c
GU:
 - five or more alternate costs
 - fathom
BG:
 - mana value 3 or greater
 - graveyard (lands)
